channel.title: Mangalam Placement
channel.description: Jobs in Company Secretary, Legal, Finance & HR Advisory

item.title: login
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] //** set nounce **//
[session_ticket.create o.set='module.ticket_id'/]
[modules.run cookies ticket_id='{module.ticket_id}' /]
[arr.create o.set="template.lin"] [status]success[/status] [ticket_id][module.get ticket_id /][/ticket_id] [url][aw2.get app.path /]/t/[module.get ticket_id /][/url] [/arr.create] [session_ticket.set_activity {module.ticket_id} collection='{module.collection}' module='redirect' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='app_id' value='{module.app_id}' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='app_secret' value='{module.app_secret}' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='app_path' value='{app.path}' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='scope' value='{module.scope}' /] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='run_after_login' value='{module.run_after_login}' c.not_empty='{module.run_after_login}'/] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='redirect_to' value='{module.redirect_to}' not_empty='{module.redirect_to}'/] [session_ticket.set {module.ticket_id} field='provider' value='linkedin' /]
[template.return template.lin /] [/templates.add]

item.title: redirect
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded: [templates.add main] [session_ticket.get {app.active.ticket} o.set='module.ses_ticket' /] [linkedin.login_url app_id='{module.ses_ticket.app_id}' app_secret='{module.ses_ticket.app_secret}' ticket_id='{app.active.ticket}' o.set='module.li_url'/] [session_ticket.set_activity {app.active.ticket} collection='{module.collection}' module='auth' /] [session_ticket.set {app.active.ticket} field='redirect_to' value='{request.redirect_to}' not_empty='{request.redirect_to}'/] [php.wp_redirect p1='{module.li_url}' /] [/templates.add]

item.title: auth
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]
[session_ticket.get {app.active.ticket} o.set='module.ses_ticket' /]
[linkedin.auth app_id='{module.ses_ticket.app_id}' app_secret='{module.ses_ticket.app_secret}' ticket_id='{app.active.ticket}' o.set='template.user_data.raw'/]
[template.set user_data.full_name="{template.user_data.raw.firstName} {template.user_data.raw.lastName}" /] [template.set user_data.first_name="{template.user_data.raw.firstName}" /] [template.set user_data.last_name="{template.user_data.raw.lastName}" /] [template.set user_data.email="{template.user_data.raw.emailAddress}" /] [template.set user_data.identifier="{template.user_data.raw.id}" /] [template.set user_data.picture_url="{template.user_data.raw.pictureUrl}" /] [template.set user_data.profile_url="{template.user_data.raw.publicProfileUrl}" /] [session_ticket.set {app.active.ticket} field='user_data' value='{template.user_data.json_encode}' /] [php.wp_redirect p1='{module.ses_ticket.redirect_to}/?t={app.active.ticket}' /] [aw2.module slug="linkedin-verification" /] [/templates.add]
